metadata.title: Kristian's Portfolio
metadata.description: Personal portfolio of Kristian, a web developer with experience in Next.js, React, and TypeScript.

hero.title: Kristian Restrepo Osorio
hero.subtitle: Systems Engineer | Web Developer | RPA | Python | JavaScript | PHP | TypeScript | Django | Next.js | Laravel

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I am a Systems Engineering student at EAFIT University, passionate about programming, automation, and web development. I focus on creating efficient and scalable solutions using languages like Python, JavaScript, and PHP, along with frameworks like Django, Laravel, and Next.js. I have developed skills in leadership, teamwork, and communication through my experience as an academic monitor and leader of student groups. I have experience in managing collaborative work using platforms like GitHub and Azure, as well as agile methodologies like Scrum. I am committed to continuous learning and exploring new technologies in software development.

magneto.title: Software Developer
magneto.subtitle: Magneto | Jan 2024 - Mar 2024
magneto.description: I designed and implemented interfaces and landing pages with Next.js, integrating backend APIs and optimizing technical SEO. I configured architectures with Django, connecting databases like Neo4j and PostgreSQL, automating processes, and applying best practices in documentation and code analysis. Additionally, I collaborated in a team under agile methodologies (SCRUM) and participated in innovation processes using design thinking to generate user-centered value propositions.

eafit.title: Academic Monitor in Computational Thinking
eafit.subtitle: EAFIT | Jan 2023 - Jun 2023
eafit.description: As a tutor for the Computational Thinking course, I provided support to first-semester students in learning Python, offering personalized tutoring and developing strategies to improve their understanding. I fostered interest in programming among students from various disciplines, motivating them to explore innovative solutions from a technological perspective.

tiktrack.title: TikTrack
tiktrack.description: TikTrack is a web application that connects companies with the perfect TikTok influencer in Colombia, sorted by location.

tonali.title: Tonali
tonali.description: Tonal√≠ is an e-commerce platform for beauty products. It features standard shopping functionalities and a unique recommendation system based on colorimetry.

automation.title: Automation of Employment Groups
automation.description: Automatic sending of messages to employment groups based on location for Magneto.
automation.imageAlt: Image of Automation of Employment Groups

softSkills.title: Soft Skills Course for Professional Development
softSkills.subtitle: Platzi | 2024

sabaneta.title: Operational Assistant
sabaneta.subtitle: Sabaneta Science, Technology and Innovation Center | Jun 2023 - Present
sabaneta.description: I supported web development, robotics, AI, and video game seedbeds, assisting teachers and students in technological activities and CTEI bootcamps. I collaborated in report management and attendance control. In addition, I developed IoT projects deployed on an on-premise server at CTEI.

oe.title: Financial Director
oe.subtitle: EAFIT Student Organization | Jan 2023 - Dec 2023
oe.description: I led the preparation of the annual budget and efficiently managed financial resources. I negotiated with suppliers and handled billing processes for events. I organized the first programming marathon event for the committee and supported student events such as Inventiva and DIAS EAFIT.

nova.title: Active Member
nova.subtitle: Nova EAFIT | Jul 2024 - Jan 2025
nova.description: I supported events related to technology and innovation for EAFIT University.
